creditline: Gift of the Minneapolis Public Library Board
description:
Mummy and Coffin, human body and painted wood, Egyptian bottom of coffin (2) is on stretcher; H 60-1/2 (mummy); L71-1/2 W20-1/2'(coffin); NO PHOTO.
Coffin, L. 71 1/2"; W. 20 1/2"; H. 14 1/2". Cover cracked in numerous places. Face area loose. Side sections split from midsection. Area 10 X 10 1/2 " in that originally covered legs and feet missing. 6 1/2" metal strip bolted into left side section. Paint flaking or absent in numerous places.
Fragments of cartonnage (painted linen) attached to body. Fragments measure 16 1/2 X 11 in. and 10 3/4 X 5 in.
medium:
Mummy, wrapped in linen
Coffim, wood
title: Mummy and Coffin
